docs.snippet: AUGUSTA, Ga., March 11 (AP) --Patty Berg fired a record 68 today--four under men's par-- and took the lead at the halfway mark in her quest for a sixth women's titleholders golf crown.
docs.lead_paragraph: AUGUSTA, Ga., March 11 (AP) --Patty Berg fired a record 68 today--four under men's par-- and took the lead at the halfway mark in her quest for a sixth women's titleholders golf crown.

headline.main: Patty Berg Assumes Lead in Titleholders Golf; ILLINOIS PRO GETS 68 FOR 144 TOTAL Patty Berg Stroke Ahead of Miss Faulk at Augusta-- Betsy Rawls Third

docs.snippet: The triple tie for first place in the international chess masters tournament at Mar del Plata, Argentina, was broken, yesterday.
docs.lead_paragraph: The triple tie for first place in the international chess masters tournament at Mar del Plata, Argentina, was broken, yesterday.

headline.main: IVKOV AND SZABO SHARE CHESS LEAD; Pachman Is Held to Draw by Gligoric and Drops to 3d in Argentine Tourney

docs.snippet: MEXICO CITY, March 12 -- President Adolfo Ruiz Cortines of Mexico formally opened the second Pan-American Games today before a capacity crowd in the huge eliptical stadium of University City.
docs.lead_paragraph: MEXICO CITY, March 12 -- President Adolfo Ruiz Cortines of Mexico formally opened the second Pan-American Games today before a capacity crowd in the huge eliptical stadium of University City.

headline.main: PRESIDENT STARTS GAMES IN MEXICO; Pan-American Event Opens With 2,000 Athletes on Hand -- Competition Today
PANNO ADVANCES IN CHESS TOURNEY; Beats Najdorf in 70 Moves to Tie for Fifth Place in Argentine Event

docs.snippet: AUGUSTA, Ga., March 13 (AP) --Patty Berg won Her sixth women's titleholders golf crown today. She shot a 73 for a total of 291. This was two strokes under the 72-hole record for this tournament.
docs.lead_paragraph: AUGUSTA, Ga., March 13 (AP) --Patty Berg won Her sixth women's titleholders golf crown today. She shot a 73 for a total of 291. This was two strokes under the 72-hole record for this tournament.

headline.main: MISS BERG'S 291 WINS AT AUGUSTA; Her Total Takes Titleholder Golf and Lowers Record for the 72-Hole Event

docs.snippet: There was a greater degree of stability in British sterling and the Canadian dollar last week, as these units rebounded from the nervous and spotty trading of the preceding week. A fair volume of business was involved.
docs.lead_paragraph: There was a greater degree of stability in British sterling and the Canadian dollar last week, as these units rebounded from the nervous and spotty trading of the preceding week. A fair volume of business was involved.

headline.main: FOREIGN EXCHANGE RATES Week Ended March 11, 1955

byline.original: Special to The New York Times

docs.snippet: Boris Ivkov of Yugoslavia gained his fifth consecutive victory in the international chess masters' tournament at Mar del Plata yesterday, according to a report from Buenos Aires.
docs.lead_paragraph: Boris Ivkov of Yugoslavia gained his fifth consecutive victory in the international chess masters' tournament at Mar del Plata yesterday, according to a report from Buenos Aires.

headline.main: IVKOV TURNS BACK LETELIER IN CHESS; Yugoslav Wins 5th in Row for Undisputed Lead-- Szabo, Gligoric Draw
